title: Jailhouse rock
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Pandro S. Berman and Richard Thorpe
brief_description: The story of a hard-working young man, jailed for manslaughter, finds an outlet for his frustrations in music, and eventually becomes a rock star. Considered to be Elvis Presley’s best film performance “Jailhouse Rock” features many songs by Jerry Liebler and Mike Stollen, including “Jailhouse Rock”, “Treat Me Nice”, and “Baby I Don’t Care”.
